markdownRemark.html:
While hosting personal site on github pages, jekyll is fine. But nowadays static site generator like GatsbyJs is more popular which is based on the fantastic React, also my favorite language is javascript.

So shifting from jekyll to gatsby seems a win-win step.

Happy blogging :-)

Reference

  • GatsbyJs
  • How to Deploy a GatsbyJS Blog on GitHub Pages as a User Site

frontmatter.title: life is a state of mind
